mapper.sql: RID, IDC_ID, IDC_NAME, OFFICE_TEL, EMAIL, OFFICE_ADDRESS, LINKMAN_EMAIL, ABOUT, WEBSITE, REGCODE, REGTYPE, APPRORG, REGAREACODE, REGAREANAME, REG_ADDR, LEGAL_NAME, LEGAL_SEX, LEGAL_CERT_TYPE, LEGAL_CERT_CODE, LEGAL_PHONE, LEGAL_OFFI_TEL, LEGAL_MOBILE, LEGAL_HOUH_REG_ADD, LINKMAN, LINKMOBILE, OTHERLINKWAY, WEBSERVICE_URL, CREATTIME, CREATORID, MODIFIEDTIME, MODIFIERID, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE

RID, IDC_ID, IDC_NAME, OFFICE_TEL, EMAIL, OFFICE_ADDRESS, LINKMAN_EMAIL, ABOUT, WEBSITE, REGCODE, REGTYPE, APPRORG, REGAREACODE, REGAREANAME, REG_ADDR, LEGAL_NAME, LEGAL_SEX, LEGAL_CERT_TYPE, LEGAL_CERT_CODE, LEGAL_PHONE, LEGAL_OFFI_TEL, LEGAL_MOBILE, LEGAL_HOUH_REG_ADD, LINKMAN, LINKMOBILE, OTHERLINKWAY, WEBSERVICE_URL, CREATTIME, CREATORID, MODIFIEDTIME, MODIFIERID, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE
mapper.select: select idc.IDC_ID,idc.IDC_NAME,room.ROOM_IDX,room.ROOM_NAME FROM SMMS_IDC_INFO idc, SMMS_ROOM_INFO room WHERE idc.IDC_ID=room.ACCESS_ID and idc.RECORDSTATE='0' and room.RECORDSTATE='0' ORDER BY idc.IDC_ID,ROOM_IDX
select WEBSERVICE_URL as url,RID as rid FROM SMMS_IDC_INFO where RECORDSTATE ='0'
select WEBSERVICE_URL as url FROM SMMS_IDC_INFO where RECORDSTATE ='0' and RID = #{rid}
SELECT IDC_ID FROM smms_idc_info WHERE IDC_ID = #{IDC_ID}
select from SMMS_IDC_INFO idc where idc.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_IDC_INFO set RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where RID=#{RID}
mapper.insert: insert into SMMS_IDC_INFO ( RID, IDC_ID, IDC_NAME, OFFICE_TEL, EMAIL, OFFICE_ADDRESS, LINKMAN_EMAIL, ABOUT, WEBSITE, REGCODE, REGTYPE, APPRORG, REGAREACODE, REGAREANAME, REG_ADDR, LEGAL_NAME, LEGAL_SEX, LEGAL_CERT_TYPE, LEGAL_CERT_CODE, LEGAL_PHONE, LEGAL_OFFI_TEL, LEGAL_MOBILE, LEGAL_HOUH_REG_ADD, LINKMAN, LINKMOBILE, OTHERLINKWAY, WEBSERVICE_URL, CREATTIME, CREATORID, MODIFIEDTIME, MODIFIERID, LIABMAN, LIABDEPT, LIABORG, RECORDSTATE) values ( #{RID}, #{IDC_ID}, #{IDC_NAME}, #{OFFICE_TEL}, #{EMAIL}, #{OFFICE_ADDRESS}, #{LINKMAN_EMAIL}, #{ABOUT}, #{WEBSITE}, #{REGCODE}, #{REGTYPE}, #{APPRORG}, #{REGAREACODE}, #{REGAREANAME}, #{REG_ADDR}, #{LEGAL_NAME}, #{LEGAL_SEX}, #{LEGAL_CERT_TYPE}, #{LEGAL_CERT_CODE}, #{LEGAL_PHONE}, #{LEGAL_OFFI_TEL}, #{LEGAL_MOBILE}, #{LEGAL_HOUH_REG_ADD}, #{LINKMAN}, #{LINKMOBILE}, #{OTHERLINKWAY}, #{WEBSERVICE_URL}, #{CREATTIME}, #{CREATORID}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{MODIFIERID}, #{LIABMAN}, #{LIABDEPT}, #{LIABORG}, #{RECORDSTATE})
